title: Supreme Court Wraps Up Big Term With Death Penalty, Redistricting And More
teaser: The high court ended its term Monday with rulings on redistricting powers and a lethal injection drug. For details on the court's decisions this term, Renee Montagne talks with NPR's Nina Totenberg.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
